tuv.seg: Planning and development in Ireland
Cúrsaí Pleanála agus Forbartha in Éirinn
Each local authority has responsibility for registering derelict sites in its area, communicating with owners and collecting levies
Tá gach údarás áitiúil freagrach as déileáil le láithreáin tréigthe ina cheantar
Recent legislation provides for similar arrangements in respect of vacant sites
Foráiltear i reachtaíocht nua dá mhacasamhail de shocruithe maidir le láithreáin fholmha
Introduction to the different types of planning permission including domestic housing. How and where to apply for planning permission
Cur síos ar na cinéalacha difriúla cead pleanála a bhaineann le tithíocht phríobháideach, cén chaoi agus cén áit ar chóir iarratas a dhéanamh
This document is in: Housing > Planning permission
This document is in: Tithíocht > Ceadú Pleanála
Local authority development plans are the blueprints for the planning and development of local areas
Cur síos gairid ar phleananna forbartha atá ina ndréachtanna do phleanáil agus forbairt cheantair
This document is in: Housing > Planning permission
This document is in: Tithíocht > Ceadú Pleanála
Planning permission for altering a house
Cead pleanála chun athrú a dhéanamh ar theach
Details the plannning requirements if extending a house, converting a house, or changing the use of a building
Cur síos ar na riachtanais phleanála a bhaineann le síneadh a chur le teach, athrú a dhéanamh ar theach, nó athrú a dhéanamh ar úsáid fhoirgnimh
This document is in: Housing > Planning permission
This document is in: Tithíocht > Ceadú Pleanála
Planning permission for building a house
Cead pleanála chun teach a thógáil
There are different types of planning permission applying to domestic housing. An explanation and how and where to apply
Cur síos ar na cinéalacha éagsúla cead pleanála a bhaineann le tithíocht príobháideach, cén chaoi agus cén áit ar chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh
This document is in: Housing > Planning permission
This document is in: Tithíocht > Ceadú Pleanála
Commenting on a planning application
Cuntas a thabhairt ar Iarratas ar chead pleanála
It is possible for anyone to make a comment on a planning application. Find out how to make a submission or observation
Do chearta maidir le cuntas a thabhairt ar iarratas ar chead pleanála agus na rialacha a bhaineann leis
This document is in: Housing > Planning permission
This document is in: Tithíocht > Ceadú Pleanála
Appealing a planning permission decision
Achomharc a dhéanamh ar chead pleanála
Outlines the circumstances in which you can appeal a planning decision and the rules governing same
Cur síos ar na cúinsí gur féidir achomharc a lorg ar chinneadh ar chead pleanála agus na rialacha a bhaineann leis
This document is in: Housing > Planning permission
This document is in: Tithíocht > Ceadú Pleanála
Judicial review in planning and environmental matters
Athbhreithniú breithiúnach i gcúrsaí pleanála agus comhshaoil
Public decisions may be judicially reviewed by the High Court to determine whether they are illegal
Is féidir leis an Ard-Chúirt athbhreithniú breithiúnach a dhéanamh ar chinntí poiblí le dearbhú an bhfuil siad neamhdhleathach
Find out about judicial review in the environmental and planning areas
Faigh amach faoi athbhreithniú breithiúnach sna réimsí comhshaoil agus pleanála
This document is in: Environment > Environmental law
This document is in: Comhshaol > Dlí Chomhshaoil
Dangerous places and structures
Áiteanna agus struchtúir chontúirteacha
Each local authority has responsibility for dealing with dangerous places and structures in its area
Tá freagracht ar gach údarás áitiúil as déileáil le háiteanna agus struchtúir chontúirteacha atá ina gceantar
Most Read in "Environment"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Comhshaol"
